arts.ttl: Newcastle involved in another goalless away draw as they hold Bournemouth
arts.sum: A much-changed Newcastle played out a third consecutive goalless away Premier League draw as high-flying Bournemouth were held at the Vitality Stadium.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs. Newcastle – Eddie Howe: Pre-Match Press Conference
arts.sum: Bournemouth will look to maintain their strong early-season form when they host Newcastle United on Sunday. The Cherries sit fourth in the table after three wins from four, while Eddie Howe’s Magpies are still searching for consistency. Andoni Iraola’s team has responded superbly since their opening defeat at still-undefeated Liverpool, beating Wolves, Tottenham, and Brighton […]

arts.sum: A meeting between two sides in contrasting form takes place at the Vitality Stadium on Sunday, as Bournemouth host Newcastle United.
